discussion.p: Section 22.1.1.1.1 has the following listed in Table 51: ctype<char> , ctype<wchar_t>.

blockquote.p: The instantiations required in Table 51 (22.1.1.1.1) namely ctype<char> and ctype<wchar_t> , implement character classing appropriate to the implementation's native character set.

discussion.p: However, Section only has a detailed description of the ctype<char> specialization, not the ctype<wchar_t> specialization.

resolution.p: Add the ctype<wchar_t> detailed class description to Section .

rationale.p: Specialization for wchar_t is not needed since the default is acceptable.
